pullrequest.title: use ignition-math4 for ignition-common from prerelease repo until Dec 1

content.raw:
I just added the prerelease repo for ignition-gui too, since it's trying to install ignition-cmake too since it builds ignition-math from source

* [failed build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-zesty-amd64/4/)
* [new build with this branch](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-zesty-amd64/5/)
content.html:
